entities.name: slytherin house
entities.description: Slytherin House is mentioned as a part of Hogwarts that played its part. It is described in the context of Phineas Nigellus' speech.

relationships.description: Phineas Nigellus praised Slytherin House for its contribution. This is evident from his speech where he says 'Let our contribution not be forgotten!'
